org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap
Class DiscoveryBase

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.DiscoveryBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, GenericStateModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpDiscovery, MulticastDiscovery, RMIDiscovery
public abstract class DiscoveryBase
extends GenericStateModelAdapter
implements Component

This component is a base class for (client) bootstrap discoverers.

Per-protocol subclasses call addPoller(java.lang.Object) to create an inner Poller class per bootstrap location (e.g. a poller for URL http://foo.com:123 and http://bar.com:456). These pollers are told to start/stop according to the DiscoveryService, which is controlled by the BootstrapService. Pollers are also periodically told to "lookup", to find bundles at the remote locations.
